project.objective: The objective of the present action is the establishment and delivery of a specific Enterprise Europe Network service designed to enhance the innovation management capacity of SMEs, by providing in-depth support in the areas where these services are absent or unaffordable on local markets. The service will also aim at supporting beneficiaries of the SME Instrument (H2020) dealing with coaching assignments and addressing specific innovation weaknesses.
project.title: Support services to IMProve innovation and competitiveness of business in Lombardia and Emilia-Romagna
